RACE.RACE_TEXT: All American Futurity Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 440 Y Dirt CR: 81. Futurity Trial Purse 10000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO THE 2023 ALL AMERICAN QUARTER HORSE FUTURITY. Weight: 124 lbs. All horses must enter for the trials on Friday August 4, 2023 by 11:00 A.M. and pay $1,200 entry fee, if they are to run in the tri als. Late nominations of $50,000 (includes all fees) will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The five fastest times from the trials each day will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List. still eligible at time of entry into the trials, by paying the $1,200 entry fee. The five fastest times from the trials each day will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List NOTE: All races this day day will be trials, first post time may change due to the number of races.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRUSTY JESS broke in, steady bid, in time. BACARDI vied, outfinished. POLITIKO broke awkwardly, crowded. JOHNNY RINGO 123 came in start. FAMOUS LADY KATE no mishap. ARISPA ROJO mid pack, evenly. EXXPLODE mid pack, evenly. BV TRUST IN YOU broke slowly. PISTON STROKE hopped start. MR JUNE BUG PERRY outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny Ringo 123
ENTRY.OWNER: Jungers Marc E Jungers Michelle Pitcock Bob Pitcock Sharalyn and Bay Carolyn C

ENTRY.NAME: Trusty Jess
ENTRY.OWNER: Willis Ray Snyder Cherri Michelet and Eldridge Clifton
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, steady bid, in time

RACE.FOOTNOTES: AB WOW held well, driving. APOLITICAL POWER bobbled start, steady close. MIDNITE POLLITICS steady bid, outnodded for place. FORGIVEN COWBOY in close, not enough. JETTY BLACK MOON broke out. XTREMLY clear path, no rally. WON THE SHAKE veered in start. MR PRIZE KVN veered in start. IM SPECIALLY FAMOUS broke in.

ENTRY.NAME: Forgiven Cowboy
ENTRY.OWNER: Bradley E Gene and Bradley Tod

ENTRY.NAME: Ab Wow
ENTRY.OWNER: Bryant Jaime Brooks Melanie and Joiner Linda
